about.title: Welcom to my website!
about.text:
This website showcases projects I have designed, developed, or contributed to over the years. Whether it's an Android app, a full-stack website, or a set of low-level memory management functions in assembly, each project represents a step in my growth as a developer. I enjoy working on all levels accross the stack, and I'm always exploring new languages, paradigms, and problem solving techniques. From low-level systems to high level designs, I enjoy building solutions from the ground up.

Feel free to explore my work and reach out if you'd like to connect!

Thanks for visiting!

portfolio.name: Noise Nest
portfolio.desc: A soundboard for linux enabling users to bind custom hotkeys to play sound files through a microphone output. Saves users created configurations using TinyXML and loads them at the application start.

portfolio.name: Library Database (Website)
portfolio.desc: A website to add books to a database. Use the search bar to find books by title or author. Click on books to checkout, delete, or edit their data.

portfolio.name: Expense Tracker (Android Application)
portfolio.desc: Log purchases by inputing name, date, cost, and reason. See list of all expenses along with data such as amount spent per day and per month as well as a grand total amount spent.
